response.overview: A college student, Benny, struggles with social anxiety and overthinking. Overwhelming amounts of anxious thoughts always cause him to freeze up when heâ€™s in a social setting. Benny feels that his anxieties are isolating him, and seeks to battle them by stepping far out of his comfort zone.
response.tagline: A college student with social anxiety, battles his greatest fears and faces his inner self, all to make a friend.
response.title: Singularity
